name: DocumentLayoutAnalyzer
description: Analyzes layout and formatting of uploaded documents against templates.

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: The uploaded document file to analyze.

outputs.name: matched_template
outputs.description: The name of the template that best matches the uploaded document.

outputs.name: layout_differences
outputs.description: List of layout or formatting differences found.

outputs.name: compliance_issues
outputs.description: List of compliance issues found in the document.
